name: Good Day
description:
From the skies above, you influence a lowly creature on the planet in this simple to play solitaire board game. Players roll a die, move their player token, and then place down a pattern on the 3x3 grid to influence the overall benefits of each tile. Is your player standing on a positive tile? That's a good day. Is your player standing on a negative tile? That's not such a good day. Quick to pick up, takes some time to master. A perfect game to teach the critical thinking. Also includes a head-to-head mode where you can challenge a friend in pass-and-play fun times.

Originally designed as a board game, I decided to digitize for my own sanity.
